title: Pigeonhole Tower
text:
Pigeon SSNA want to build a tower with some wood walls. Let's describe the tower they want to make:A Tower can consist of different number of level.If a tower containLlevels then 1stlevel must containLholes, 2ndlevelL-1,3rdlevelL-2…..Llevel contain 1 hole.Each room contain 3 wood walls.See the picture below:3 Level Tower4 Level towerNow pigeon SSNA hasnwood walls. What is maximum number of level he can made.InputInput starts with an integerT(≤ 100000), denoting the number of test cases.Each case starts with a line containing an integern(1 ≤n≤ 1012)OutputFor each case of input you have to print the case number and expected answer.ExampleInput:2
15
24Output:Case 1: 3
Case 2: 4
